Text: @radioman-It If I recall correctly you're the one who uploaded the ISO of the Update 1 (thanks a bunch for that). If you can upload a faster torrent for this one, please do so (my internet is crappy beyond belief).
i'm still downloading in both ways, to double check the integrity, slow as sleeping turtle... elapsed time in torrent: 8h, in crappy ms installer: 1h ;} EST: in this life time

Looks like we all here having the same internet connection, & seeing 1 seeder to 50 leechers isn't quite pleasing.
Thanx 4 uploading man & hopefully anyone who can seed will seed.
integrity status: verified, all files are identical
